resources.string: Come and discover the Colonial garden of America
We offer a haven of peace and tranquility in northern Antioquia accompanied majestic landscapes, good food and the best service. For more information: (57) (4) 8634033

The town offers a festival with renowned artists November the first bridge festival called the balconies also have two equine exhibitions throughout the year with samples of dance, food and fun for the whole family, reports in the (57 (4) 8634033
Our municipality has a large space for family fun (5 minutes from the town )called La vega, where you can prepare your favorite food and enjoy a good river to swim
Enjoy the carolinita night accompanied by the best popular music, multiple bars also known as "cantinas" where the sound of tangos can enjoy dancing, food and good drinks
We offer nature walks, hiking and fishing as a healthy activity that will allow you to experience the beauty of our land. Ask our tourist office for guided tours (57(4)8634033
Our town has cobbled streets and a main park surrounded by colonial style balconies, besides our main park we have a tribute to a son of the people singer Juanes
Walk over really beautiful places like the top of the cross, forests and Guanacas Tenche and miraflores reservoirs and pockets you will enjoy the flora and fauna of the municipality

The town offers a festival with renowned artists November the first bridge festival called the balconies also have two equine exhibitions throughout the year with samples of dance, food and fun for the whole family, reports in the (57) (4) 8634033

Luxury accommodation one block from the main park. It has single and double rooms at $60,000 and $80,000 night per person includes lunch and dinner and access to play area and jacuzzi. Contact:(57)(4)8634107
Simple accommodation for 12 people with single, double with private bath and tv, Prices from $ 30,000 to $55,000 and offers breakfast.Contact:(57)(4)8634205

Lodging in the field located in the path of peace 15 minutes from town provides double and family rooms besides service restaurant and common room with TV and games for $30,000 per night.Phone:(57(48634058
Thanks for your interest in our town
